backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing layout and event logs, with methods to save layouts and emit or query events.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files and component versions.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing short summaries for all frontend project files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining OKLCH color variables and dark mode styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component applying theming and rendering the control panel screen with notifications.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Ad: Modal component for configuring and creating new controls with validation and type‑specific settings.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Co: Renders each control type with interaction handling and emits signals to the backend.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Cr: Button that opens the AddControlModal and triggers control creation with full config.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Dr: Wrapper enabling draggable repositioning of controls in edit mode with selection handling.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Im: Provides UI to export the current control layout to JSON or import a layout file, showing errors and success toasts.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/In: Displays and edits properties of the selected control, including ID, type, binary codes, and radio options, with validation and delete actions.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Mo: Button that switches between edit and runtime modes using panel mode state.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Re: Shows a scrollable list of recently emitted signals with timestamps and a refresh option.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Wo: Renders all controls in the workspace with drag/edit behavior depending on mode, or a placeholder when empty.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useControlLayout.ts: Manages local control layout state, syncing with backend, creating/updating/deleting controls, validating IDs, and saving or importing layouts.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities, login/logout, and managing auth status.
frontend/src/hooks/usePanelMode.ts: Stores and toggles the panel's edit/runtime mode with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecentSignals.ts: Fetches recent backend events on an interval and exposes loading and refresh utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useSignalEmitter.ts: Offers a mutation to emit signals to the backend and refreshes recent events on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables, dark mode values, global styles, and custom scrollbar rules.
frontend/src/lib/binaryCode.ts: Validates binary strings and deterministically generates an 8‑bit binary code from a seed.
frontend/src/lib/controlDefaults.ts: Provides default configuration objects for each control type when creating new controls.
frontend/src/lib/download.ts: Implements a helper to download arbitrary data as a JSON file in the browser.
frontend/src/lib/layoutSerialization.ts: Validates layout JSON, checks control fields and binary codes, and provides import/export helpers.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exposes a utility for merging Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and loads global styles.
Renders the main control panel UI with header, workspace, inspector, signals panel, and footer.
frontend/src/types/controlPanel.ts: Defines TypeScript types for control configs, radio options, and layout structures.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors using CSS variables, custom animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Describes project state, goals, architecture notes, known issues, and tracked feature requirements.
